review: I admit, I am electronically challenged but even I had no problem hooking this to my TV. Very simple and very easy to use. I use it to watch TV shows and movies via Netflix and love the voice command. I love the small size, that its fast and so far, I've encountered no problems at all.
author: Christy Tillery French "author"

review: Super fast for Amazon content.  But, my Netflix seems to lag, even more with this than when I used my older Roku device (which was the 720p model).  Wonder if that is intentional by Amazon?  If you watch mostly Amazon content, then you should definitely get this.  If you watch mostly Netflix or other sources, I would recommend you look for something better such as newest Roku device or Apple TV.
